vulnerabilities.Details: Request without CSRF token was accepted (status 302).
vulnerabilities.evidence: Token omitted and server response matched baseline.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement CSRF protection using synchronizer tokens, SameSite cookies, or double submit tokens.
